original:
Using DS wireless and Wi-Fi
communication,
You can battle your friends!

There are four rules in place
during link battles:
No.1, you cannot scan the
opponent Digimon!
No.2, the maximum number of
Digimon in a match is 3 vs 3!
No.3, you cannot use any
consumables during battle!
And lastly, No.4, the person 
who emerges victorious...
Will earn more Tamer Points 
than the one who lost the battle!
translation:
Using DS wireless and Wi-Fi
communication,
You can battle your friends!

There are four rules in place
during link battles:
No.1, you cannot scan the
opponent Digimon!
No.2, the maximum number of
Digimon in a match is 3 vs 3!
No.3, you cannot use any
consumables during battle!
And lastly, No.4, the person 
who emerges victorious...
Will earn more Tamer Points 
than the one who lost the battle!

original:
Along with that, using DS
Wireless communication,
You can also exchange Digimon
with another person.
But there'll be times when you 
can't exchange, so be careful!
You can't trade a Digimon when 
it's still just an egg,
Nor when it's in your party,
or when it's out on a job,
And also not when its training.

It's also not possible when they
become part of a request.
translation:
Along with that, using DS
Wireless communication,
You can also exchange Digimon
with another person.
But there'll be times when you 
can't exchange, so be careful!
You can't trade a Digimon when 
it's still just an egg,
Nor when it's in your party,
or when it's out on a job,
And also not when its training.

It's also not possible when they
become part of a request.

original:
After you trade a Digimon via
DS Wireless communication...
You can have your Digimon train
at your friend's DigiFarm♪
But you can only leave one Digimon
at a time!
When a Digimon is out training at
a friend's DigiFarm...
It will display a special mark on the 
Digimon List showing it's training♪
After it's done training, just select
the 'Return from Training' option,
And your Digimon will return
safe and sound.
You can see the results of it's
training on a report, too!
translation:
After you trade a Digimon via
DS Wireless communication...
You can have your Digimon train
at your friend's DigiFarm♪
But you can only leave one Digimon
at a time!
When a Digimon is out training at
a friend's DigiFarm...
It will display a special mark on the 
Digimon List showing it's training♪
After it's done training, just select
the 'Return from Training' option,
And your Digimon will return
safe and sound.
You can see the results of it's
training on a report, too!

original:
During training, there are some
special controls you can use.
If you're unable to contact your
partner,
Or if your training data is somehow
lost...
You can call your Digimon back
to your own farm
By going to the Digimon List and
selecting that option.
It works the same for your
partner's Digimon.
They're able to call back their
Digimon from your farm,
By accessing their own Digimon 
List and selecting the option.
But if you cancel the training
before it's done,
You won't receive a training
report from your friend.
translation:
During training, there are some
special controls you can use.
If you're unable to contact your
partner,
Or if your training data is somehow
lost...
You can call your Digimon back
to your own farm
By going to the Digimon List and
selecting that option.
It works the same for your
partner's Digimon.
They're able to call back their
Digimon from your farm,
By accessing their own Digimon 
List and selecting the option.
But if you cancel the training
before it's done,
You won't receive a training
report from your friend.

original:
Matching is a process that involves
bringing two Digimon together...
And creating a Digimon's Egg, or
in other words, a Digiegg!
You can't get a Digiegg if you 
don't perform Matching!
And when it comes to a Digimon
born from a Digiegg,
It'll inherit the abilities of the
Digimon paired together!
translation:
Matching is a process that involves
bringing two Digimon together...
And creating a Digimon's Egg, or
in other words, a Digiegg!
You can't get a Digiegg if you 
don't perform Matching!
And when it comes to a Digimon
born from a Digiegg,
It'll inherit the abilities of the
Digimon paired together!

original:
In order to perform Matching...

You do it via DS Wireless or 
Wi-Fi communication.
You can choose to match Digimon
with either a friend,
Or anyone else through Wi-Fi.

When you've connected, your
partner's farm will be displayed...
So pick whichever Digimon you 
like from their farm!
After that,select your own 
Digimon to start Matching!
Then a Digiegg will be made!
However...
You can't perform Matching if
there are no Digimon in the farm.
translation:
In order to perform Matching...

You do it via DS Wireless or 
Wi-Fi communication.
You can choose to match Digimon
with either a friend,
Or anyone else through Wi-Fi.

When you've connected, your
partner's farm will be displayed...
So pick whichever Digimon you 
like from their farm!
After that,select your own 
Digimon to start Matching!
Then a Digiegg will be made!
However...
You can't perform Matching if
there are no Digimon in the farm.

original:
A Digimon born from a Digiegg
has a family tree,
Which records up to two
generations.
In other words, put in human 
terms...
Their grandfather and grandmother
will be recorded there!
translation:
A Digimon born from a Digiegg
has a family tree,
Which records up to two
generations.
In other words, put in human 
terms...
Their grandfather and grandmother
will be recorded there!

original:
Digieggs hatch at the island
farm of the DigiFarm.
Digimon born from Digieggs
are stronger than usual.
The condition of hatching is
different for each egg...
So try checking out the Digiegg
at the farm!
You can also buy Digiegg colors
at the shop♪
translation:
Digieggs hatch at the island
farm of the DigiFarm.
Digimon born from Digieggs
are stronger than usual.
The condition of hatching is
different for each egg...
So try checking out the Digiegg
at the farm!
You can also buy Digiegg colors
at the shop♪

original:
Oh, ^P！
Welcome back♪
translation:
Oh, ^P！
Welcome back♪

original:
Oh, ^P！
Welcome back♪
translation:
Oh, ^P！
Welcome back♪

original:
Stop right there!

The path beyond here is connected
to Graphics Board South.
That's where South City is... And 
you don't have the skill to pass!
If you want to proceed to
Graphics Board South...
Return to East City and defeat
the Local Champion first!
translation:
Stop right there!

The path beyond here is connected
to Graphics Board South.
That's where South City is... And 
you don't have the skill to pass!
If you want to proceed to
Graphics Board South...
Return to East City and defeat
the Local Champion first!

original:
Hey, stop right there! This is the
back gate of East City!
Don't think you can just sneak into
the city from the back!
Get the key for the city and enter
properly from the front!
translation:
Hey, stop right there! This is the
back gate of East City!
Don't think you can just sneak into
the city from the back!
Get the key for the city and enter
properly from the front!

original:
Stop right there!

The path beyond here is connected
to Graphics Board West.
That's where West City is... And 
you don't have the skill to pass!
If you want to proceed to
Graphics Board West...
Return to South City and defeat
the Local Champion first!
translation:
Stop right there!

The path beyond here is connected
to Graphics Board West.
That's where West City is... And 
you don't have the skill to pass!
If you want to proceed to
Graphics Board West...
Return to South City and defeat
the Local Champion first!

original:
South City is just beyond here,
but this is the back gate.
Did you think you could just sneak 
into the city from the back?
Get the key for the city and enter
properly from the front!
translation:
South City is just beyond here,
but this is the back gate.
Did you think you could just sneak 
into the city from the back?
Get the key for the city and enter
properly from the front!

original:
Stop right there!

The path beyond here is connected
to Graphics Board North,
That's where North City is... And 
you don't have the skill to pass!
If you want to proceed to
Graphics Board North...
Return to West City and defeat
the Local Champion first!
translation:
Stop right there!

The path beyond here is connected
to Graphics Board North,
That's where North City is... And 
you don't have the skill to pass!
If you want to proceed to
Graphics Board North...
Return to West City and defeat
the Local Champion first!

original:
I...I was just spacing out a bit
because it's so cold!
T-t-t-the back gate of West City
is just past here!
Go get the key for the city and
enter from the front gate, instead.
......Achoo!
translation:
I...I was just spacing out a bit
because it's so cold!
T-t-t-the back gate of West City
is just past here!
Go get the key for the city and
enter from the front gate, instead.
......Achoo!

original:
Oh, ^P! Thanks for all your
hard work out there!
And of course, thank you for 
saving the Digital World!
So, would you like to see something
good...?
translation:
Oh, ^P! Thanks for all your
hard work out there!
And of course, thank you for 
saving the Digital World!
So, would you like to see something
good...?

original: Do you want to see something good?
translation: Do you want to see something good?

original: Yes!
translation: Yes!

original: No thanks...
translation: No thanks...

original:
Is that so? That's too bad...

If you ever want to see, feel free
to come back again!
translation:
Is that so? That's too bad...

If you ever want to see, feel free
to come back again!

original: You got it! Then look closely now!
translation: You got it! Then look closely now!

original:
What do you think? Wasn't that
super interesting?!
If you wanna see it again, just
come back and talk to me!
translation:
What do you think? Wasn't that
super interesting?!
If you wanna see it again, just
come back and talk to me!

Obtained a consumable item!
^i
translation:
Obtained a consumable item!
^i

Obtained a key item!

translation: Closed the valve!

original: The valve is already closed!
translation: The valve is already closed!

original:
I can tell you more about the
DigiLab, DigiFarm,
and various other features of
the DigiBase.
translation:
I can tell you more about the
DigiLab, DigiFarm,
and various other features of
the DigiBase.

original: Tell me about the Digilab.
translation: Tell me about the Digilab.

original: Tell me about the DigiFarm.
translation: Tell me about the DigiFarm.

original: Tell me something else.
translation: Tell me something else.

original: I have no questions
translation: I have no questions

original: I want to fix the Evolution Tree.
translation: I want to fix the Evolution Tree.

original: I want to make my Digimon stronger.
translation: I want to make my Digimon stronger.

original: Back
translation: Back

original: Tell me about Repairing
translation: Tell me about Repairing

original: Tell me about DigiPlates
translation: Tell me about DigiPlates

original: Tell me about the Evolution Tree
translation: Tell me about the Evolution Tree

original: Back
translation: Back

original: Tell me about DigiConverting
translation: Tell me about DigiConverting

original: Tell me about Digivolution and Degeneration
translation: Tell me about Digivolution and Degeneration

original: Tell me about Digimon Loading
translation: Tell me about Digimon Loading

original: Back
translation: Back

original:
'Repairing' refers to when you 
fix Bug Plates.
You can clean the Plate with the
Cleaner, fix holes with Putty,
And remove crystal bugs with
the Mega Laser.
By doing that, a clean, repaired
DigiPlate will be produced.
However, if you damage your
DigiPlate too much,
Its HP will deplete, and once it's
empty, the plate will break.
Also, when the Repairing
begins...
The viruses that block the 
system will also multiply.
If you don't hurry, the 
Repairing will be forced to stop.
translation:
'Repairing' refers to when you 
fix Bug Plates.
You can clean the Plate with the
Cleaner, fix holes with Putty,
And remove crystal bugs with
the Mega Laser.
By doing that, a clean, repaired
DigiPlate will be produced.
However, if you damage your
DigiPlate too much,
Its HP will deplete, and once it's
empty, the plate will break.
Also, when the Repairing
begins...
The viruses that block the 
system will also multiply.
If you don't hurry, the 
Repairing will be forced to stop.

original:
DigiPlates are clumps of data that
are inserted into the Evolution Tree.
Each plate holds the data of
a different Digimon.
So the Tamer now holds the fate
of that Digimon in their hands.
Why's that? Because the DigiPlate
itself is a chance for Digivolution.
The parameters will also change
depending on how well it's repaired.
If the Plate is still dirty, the 
Digimon will be weaker.
So make sure to take Repairing
seriously, okay?
translation:
DigiPlates are clumps of data that
are inserted into the Evolution Tree.
Each plate holds the data of
a different Digimon.
So the Tamer now holds the fate
of that Digimon in their hands.
Why's that? Because the DigiPlate
itself is a chance for Digivolution.
The parameters will also change
depending on how well it's repaired.
If the Plate is still dirty, the 
Digimon will be weaker.
So make sure to take Repairing
seriously, okay?

original:
The Evolution Tree governs
the Digivolution of a Digimon.
That's why we repair the plates
that have fallen from the Tree,
In order to return them to their
original state.
When a DigiPlate is set into the
Evolution Tree...
A Digimon's Digivolution and 
Degeneration path will unlock.
In other words, depending on
the Evolution Condition,
You'll be able to Digivolve or
Degenerate your Partner Digimon.
You will also be able to 
DigiConvert the Digimon, too!♪
translation:
The Evolution Tree governs
the Digivolution of a Digimon.
That's why we repair the plates
that have fallen from the Tree,
In order to return them to their
original state.
When a DigiPlate is set into the
Evolution Tree...
A Digimon's Digivolution and 
Degeneration path will unlock.
In other words, depending on
the Evolution Condition,
You'll be able to Digivolve or
Degenerate your Partner Digimon.
You will also be able to 
DigiConvert the Digimon, too!♪

original:
If you DigiConvert the data that
you scanned during battle,
you will be able to materialize
that Digimon from that data.
But the scanned data has to be
greater than 100% or it's no use.
If the scan data is higher than 
100%...
Then that excess data will increase
the parameters of the Digimon!
translation:
If you DigiConvert the data that
you scanned during battle,
you will be able to materialize
that Digimon from that data.
But the scanned data has to be
greater than 100% or it's no use.
If the scan data is higher than 
100%...
Then that excess data will increase
the parameters of the Digimon!

original:
If you Digivolve a Digimon, their
parameters will be increased♪
However if you don't satisfy the
Digivolution condition,
Or you don't have the next form of 
that Digimon inserted in the Tree,
Then you won't be able to Digivolve
that Digimon, so watch out.
Similarly, you also have to put
the Digimon's prior form
into the Evolution Tree, too, or
it won't be able to Degenerate.
DigiPlates are very important,
so take care of them, okay?
translation:
If you Digivolve a Digimon, their
parameters will be increased♪
However if you don't satisfy the
Digivolution condition,
Or you don't have the next form of 
that Digimon inserted in the Tree,
Then you won't be able to Digivolve
that Digimon, so watch out.
Similarly, you also have to put
the Digimon's prior form
into the Evolution Tree, too, or
it won't be able to Degenerate.
DigiPlates are very important,
so take care of them, okay?

original:
Digimon Load is used to strengthen
a single Digimon,
By having that Digimon absorb the
data of other Digimon.
When using Digimon Load, a 
Digimon's Parameters change,
So try it out sometime!

However, if both Digimon don't 
have 100% friendship,
Then you can't perform 
Digimon Load. Keep that in mind.
translation:
Digimon Load is used to strengthen
a single Digimon,
By having that Digimon absorb the
data of other Digimon.
When using Digimon Load, a 
Digimon's Parameters change,
So try it out sometime!

However, if both Digimon don't 
have 100% friendship,
Then you can't perform 
Digimon Load. Keep that in mind.

translation: Tell me about Farm Islands

original: Tell me about the Digimon List
translation: Tell me about the Digimon List

original: Back
translation: Back

original: I want to play with my Digimon.
translation: I want to play with my Digimon.

translation: I want to tinker with my Farm Island.

translation: Back

translation: Tell me about my Party

translation: Tell me about the DigiBank

translation: Tell me about Exploration Teams

translation: Tell me about Talking

translation: Tell me about Training

translation: Tell me about Jobs

translation: Back

original: Tell me about Farm Information
translation: Tell me about Farm Information

original: Tell me about setting Farm Goods
translation: Tell me about setting Farm Goods

original: Tell me about Terrain and BGM
translation: Tell me about Terrain and BGM

original: Back
translation: Back

original:
You can have up to six Digimon
in your party.
Only the three Digimon at the front
can participate in battle.
You can change the positions of 
your Digimon via two methods.
During battle, you can use a 
specific command to switch out.
And outside of battle you can open
the menu with 'Start' or 'X'♪
After battle, all Digimon will get
the same amount of EXP,
regardless of their position or
participation in battle.
translation:
You can have up to six Digimon
in your party.
Only the three Digimon at the front
can participate in battle.
You can change the positions of 
your Digimon via two methods.
During battle, you can use a 
specific command to switch out.
And outside of battle you can open
the menu with 'Start' or 'X'♪
After battle, all Digimon will get
the same amount of EXP,
regardless of their position or
participation in battle.

original:
The DigiBank is a place where you
can store your Digimon.
You can switch out your party
Digimon, or rearrange them.
It's useful for when you don't
know where to put a Digimon,
Since a Tamer can only have up to
40 Digimon Partners at a time.
translation:
The DigiBank is a place where you
can store your Digimon.
You can switch out your party
Digimon, or rearrange them.
It's useful for when you don't
know where to put a Digimon,
Since a Tamer can only have up to
40 Digimon Partners at a time.

original:
You can set up to eight Digimon for
the 'Expedition Team'!
Expedition Team Digimon will find
various items for you.
The higher their friendship is, the
more variety of items they'll find.
Also, a Digimon's level and 
generation also affects this rate!
The higher their level or
generation, the better the items!♪
You can take a look at the
items the team has found
By checking out the
'Expedition Team's Report'!
translation:
You can set up to eight Digimon for
the 'Expedition Team'!
Expedition Team Digimon will find
various items for you.
The higher their friendship is, the
more variety of items they'll find.
Also, a Digimon's level and 
generation also affects this rate!
The higher their level or
generation, the better the items!♪
You can take a look at the
items the team has found
By checking out the
'Expedition Team's Report'!

original:
Conversing with your Digimon is
very important, you know?
Friendship parameters increase
the more you talk with them.
If a partner Digimon doesn't have
enough friendship...
They may not listen to you during
battle...
Friendship is also required for 
properly using DigiLoad,
So be sure to talk with your
Digimon often, okay?
translation:
Conversing with your Digimon is
very important, you know?
Friendship parameters increase
the more you talk with them.
If a partner Digimon doesn't have
enough friendship...
They may not listen to you during
battle...
Friendship is also required for 
properly using DigiLoad,
So be sure to talk with your
Digimon often, okay?

original:
By setting Farm Goods into the
Farm Island,
Digimon will be able to train and
raise their parameters.
Depending on the Farm Goods,
a different parameter will change.
There are a total of seven 
parameters that can be increased!
HP, MP,
Strength, Defense, Speed,
Friendship, and EXP!

When a Digimon runs out of stamina, 
you can recover with "DigiMeal".
translation:
By setting Farm Goods into the
Farm Island,
Digimon will be able to train and
raise their parameters.
Depending on the Farm Goods,
a different parameter will change.
There are a total of seven 
parameters that can be increased!
HP, MP,
Strength, Defense, Speed,
Friendship, and EXP!

When a Digimon runs out of stamina, 
you can recover with "DigiMeal".

original:
When you've decided on a Farm
Good to place on your farm,
You will be able to have Digimon
do jobs!
If they are successful in their jobs,
their parameters will increase!
They can also make Weapons and
Armor not sold in shops♪
translation:
When you've decided on a Farm
Good to place on your farm,
You will be able to have Digimon
do jobs!
If they are successful in their jobs,
their parameters will increase!
They can also make Weapons and
Armor not sold in shops♪

original:
A Tamer can keep up to four
Farm Islands.
And in each Farm Island,
You can place up to eight Digimon,
And up to six Farm Goods♪

You can check everything through
the Farm Information,
Such as Digimon and Farm Goods 
in the farm, as well as set Boards.
On top of that, you can also see
how much EXP is gained per day!
It's a very important resource,
so be sure to check it out!
translation:
A Tamer can keep up to four
Farm Islands.
And in each Farm Island,
You can place up to eight Digimon,
And up to six Farm Goods♪

You can check everything through
the Farm Information,
Such as Digimon and Farm Goods 
in the farm, as well as set Boards.
On top of that, you can also see
how much EXP is gained per day!
It's a very important resource,
so be sure to check it out!

original:
You can set up to six Farm Goods
in each Farm Island.
You can buy Farm Goods at various
shops...
As well as receive them as 
rewards for completing requests♪
It's best you look into what 
Parameters you want to increase,
and then set your Farm Goods
accordingly.
translation:
You can set up to six Farm Goods
in each Farm Island.
You can buy Farm Goods at various
shops...
As well as receive them as 
rewards for completing requests♪
It's best you look into what 
Parameters you want to increase,
and then set your Farm Goods
accordingly.

original:
When it comes to Terrain Boards
and BGM Boards,
They determine how much EXP 
a Digimon earns per day!
There are Boards ideal for each
species of Digimon,
And each Terrain Board and BGM
Board has 9 different types.
But you can only set one Terrain 
Board,
And one BGM Board at a time.

So be sure to select the best 
board for the farm Digimon!
translation:
When it comes to Terrain Boards
and BGM Boards,
They determine how much EXP 
a Digimon earns per day!
There are Boards ideal for each
species of Digimon,
And each Terrain Board and BGM
Board has 9 different types.
But you can only set one Terrain 
Board,
And one BGM Board at a time.

So be sure to select the best 
board for the farm Digimon!

original: Tell me about Saving
translation: Tell me about Saving

original: Tell me about HP & MP Recovery
translation: Tell me about HP & MP Recovery

original: Tell me about the Quest PC
translation: Tell me about the Quest PC

original: Back
translation: Back

original:
Whenever you need to save, just 
press the X or Start button!
Once you've opened up the 
menu...
You can save at any time, 
anywhere you want!
translation:
Whenever you need to save, just 
press the X or Start button!
Once you've opened up the 
menu...
You can save at any time, 
anywhere you want!

original:
Any HP and MP lost during 
battle...
Will be fully replenished whenever
your Digimon levels up.
Outside of that, there's also the
bed in your Private Room,
Just press the A button in front
of the bed.
You can also ask for 
MarineAngemon's help, but...
That'll cost you a few Bits.
translation:
Any HP and MP lost during 
battle...
Will be fully replenished whenever
your Digimon levels up.
Outside of that, there's also the
bed in your Private Room,
Just press the A button in front
of the bed.
You can also ask for 
MarineAngemon's help, but...
That'll cost you a few Bits.

original:
Hey ^P, did you notice
in your Private Room,
Next to Lopmon, there's a
Quest PC there?
Using the Quest PC, you can 
accept quests from Digimon.
They're listed in the PC as
'Requests'.
...You're saying haven't received 
any quests yet...?
Hey don't worry about it. 
I'm sure as your name gets out,
And other Digimon see how
reliable you are,
You'll receive all sorts of
quests!
So be sure to take a look at
the Quest PC often, okay?
translation:
Hey ^P, did you notice
in your Private Room,
Next to Lopmon, there's a
Quest PC there?
Using the Quest PC, you can 
accept quests from Digimon.
They're listed in the PC as
'Requests'.
...You're saying haven't received 
any quests yet...?
Hey don't worry about it. 
I'm sure as your name gets out,
And other Digimon see how
reliable you are,
You'll receive all sorts of
quests!
So be sure to take a look at
the Quest PC often, okay?

original:
In order to Digivolve Digimon, first
you must know the Digimon, Calu!
I'll teach you all about Digimon's
parameters, Calu!
translation:
In order to Digivolve Digimon, first
you must know the Digimon, Calu!
I'll teach you all about Digimon's
parameters, Calu!

original: Tell me about basic parameters
translation: Tell me about basic parameters

original: Tell me about special parameters
translation: Tell me about special parameters

translation: I have no questions

Tell me about HP, MP, Level, 
Attack & Defense

Tell me about HP, MP, Level, 
Attack & Defense

Tell me about Speed, Generaton,
Species & Family
translation:
Tell me about Speed, Generaton,
Species & Family

translation: Back

Tell me about Ability, Friendship
& Traits
translation:
Tell me about Ability, Friendship
& Traits

Tell me about 
Elemental types & Skills

Tell me about 
Elemental types & Skills

original:
HP refers to a Digimon's 
stamina in battle,
While MP is the energy required
to use attacks during battle, Calu.
Without MP, your Digimon won't
be able to use techniques.
Once your Digimon's HP reaches
zero, it'll faint,
And consequently be taken out
of battle.
To prevent that, always keep an
eye on your Digimon's HP & MP.
Monitoring your Digimon is a
major responsibility, Calu!
You can raise your Digimon's HP
& MP through battle training,
As well as by using the farm, so
work hard, Calu!
translation:
HP refers to a Digimon's 
stamina in battle,
While MP is the energy required
to use attacks during battle, Calu.
Without MP, your Digimon won't
be able to use techniques.
Once your Digimon's HP reaches
zero, it'll faint,
And consequently be taken out
of battle.
To prevent that, always keep an
eye on your Digimon's HP & MP.
Monitoring your Digimon is a
major responsibility, Calu!
You can raise your Digimon's HP
& MP through battle training,
As well as by using the farm, so
work hard, Calu!

original:
A Digimon's level can increase from
level 1 until Max Level, Calu!
Their Max Level can be increased
through Digivolution & Degeneration.
To raise a Digimon's level, you 
need to work hard,
Gathering EXP from battle, and
through Farm Island expeditions!
Once the EXP exceeds a fixed
number,
The Digimon will level up, Calu!♪

When a Digimon's level 
increases...
It's HP, MP, Strength and Speed
will also increase, Calu♪
translation:
A Digimon's level can increase from
level 1 until Max Level, Calu!
Their Max Level can be increased
through Digivolution & Degeneration.
To raise a Digimon's level, you 
need to work hard,
Gathering EXP from battle, and
through Farm Island expeditions!
Once the EXP exceeds a fixed
number,
The Digimon will level up, Calu!♪

When a Digimon's level 
increases...
It's HP, MP, Strength and Speed
will also increase, Calu♪

original:
A Digimon's Strength comes into
play when it uses an attack,
As it will determine the amount of
damage the opponent will take, Calu.
Therefore, the higher a Digimon's
Strength...
The more damage the opponent
will take, Calu!
As for a Digimon's 
Defence...
It will determine the amount of
damage your Digimon will take.
So the higher your Digimon's
Defence is,
The less damage it will receive
from an opponent, Calu!
On top of training to increase 
these parameters,
You can also equip Weapons
and Armor, Calu!♪
translation:
A Digimon's Strength comes into
play when it uses an attack,
As it will determine the amount of
damage the opponent will take, Calu.
Therefore, the higher a Digimon's
Strength...
The more damage the opponent
will take, Calu!
As for a Digimon's 
Defence...
It will determine the amount of
damage your Digimon will take.
So the higher your Digimon's
Defence is,
The less damage it will receive
from an opponent, Calu!
On top of training to increase 
these parameters,
You can also equip Weapons
and Armor, Calu!♪

original:
Your Digimon's Speed determines
the order of attack during battle!
This particular parameter is
actually very important, Calu!
If you can get in some major
damage first during battle,
Then you can finish the battle off 
without any damage taken, Calu!
It may seem simple, but be sure
to value that parameter, Calu.
translation:
Your Digimon's Speed determines
the order of attack during battle!
This particular parameter is
actually very important, Calu!
If you can get in some major
damage first during battle,
Then you can finish the battle off 
without any damage taken, Calu!
It may seem simple, but be sure
to value that parameter, Calu.

original:
When a Tamer is skilled at raising
Digimon...
They can become stronger
by going through stages,
From Fresh, In-Training, Rookie, to
Champion, Ultimate and Mega!♪
For In-Training and Rookie, up to
three techniques can be learned...
While Champion, Ultimate and Mega
can learn up to four, Calu!♪
There's no one way for a 
Digimon to reach Mega stage,
So there are infinite possibilities,
Calu!
translation:
When a Tamer is skilled at raising
Digimon...
They can become stronger
by going through stages,
From Fresh, In-Training, Rookie, to
Champion, Ultimate and Mega!♪
For In-Training and Rookie, up to
three techniques can be learned...
While Champion, Ultimate and Mega
can learn up to four, Calu!♪
There's no one way for a 
Digimon to reach Mega stage,
So there are infinite possibilities,
Calu!

original:
Digimon branch out to 9 Species
and 33 Families,
And each Digimon belongs to
one of these categories.
Each Species and Family have
strengths and weaknesses
That exist according to their
attributes, Calu!
That's why, if you know your
opponent's Species and Family,
You can finish them off much
easier in battle, Calu!
However...
You won't be told the opponents' 
Species and Family...
That is, until you attack, Calu♪
translation:
Digimon branch out to 9 Species
and 33 Families,
And each Digimon belongs to
one of these categories.
Each Species and Family have
strengths and weaknesses
That exist according to their
attributes, Calu!
That's why, if you know your
opponent's Species and Family,
You can finish them off much
easier in battle, Calu!
However...
You won't be told the opponents' 
Species and Family...
That is, until you attack, Calu♪

original:
When it comes to a Digimon's
Ability...
It's a parameter that increases
by repeated Digivolution, Calu.
The more Ability a Digimon has,
the more damage can be delivered.
And the less damage your Digimon
will take from the opponent, Calu.
translation:
When it comes to a Digimon's
Ability...
It's a parameter that increases
by repeated Digivolution, Calu.
The more Ability a Digimon has,
the more damage can be delivered.
And the less damage your Digimon
will take from the opponent, Calu.

original:
As for your Digimon's Friendship...

It represents the bond between
the Digimon and Tamer, Calu♪
The closer to 100%, the more
attached a Digimon is.
However, when a Digimon's 
Friendship is low...
It won't listen to you during battle,
so be careful, Calu.
If you want to increase a 
Digimon's Friendship,
You can do things like keep it
in your party,
Let it take part in battle, and
let it socialize in the DigiFarm♪
translation:
As for your Digimon's Friendship...

It represents the bond between
the Digimon and Tamer, Calu♪
The closer to 100%, the more
attached a Digimon is.
However, when a Digimon's 
Friendship is low...
It won't listen to you during battle,
so be careful, Calu.
If you want to increase a 
Digimon's Friendship,
You can do things like keep it
in your party,
Let it take part in battle, and
let it socialize in the DigiFarm♪

original:
Traits are specific abilities
possessed by Digimon, Calu.
Every Digimon has between one 
and four Traits, Calu.
Each Trait has a particular effect
on a Digimon,
From increasing their Strength or
Defence,
To raising Critical or Evasion
rates, there's a variety!♪
translation:
Traits are specific abilities
possessed by Digimon, Calu.
Every Digimon has between one 
and four Traits, Calu.
Each Trait has a particular effect
on a Digimon,
From increasing their Strength or
Defence,
To raising Critical or Evasion
rates, there's a variety!♪

original:
Each attack has an Element, and
there are 6 possible Elements,
Fire, Water, Electric, Light, Dark
and Fighting, Calu.
When it comes to Elements,
if a Digimon is attacked
by a technique with an
Element it has a weakness to,
It will end up taking a lot of 
damage, Calu.
On the other hand, if a Digimon
is attacked
by a technique it has a resistance
to, it won't take much damage.
translation:
Each attack has an Element, and
there are 6 possible Elements,
Fire, Water, Electric, Light, Dark
and Fighting, Calu.
When it comes to Elements,
if a Digimon is attacked
by a technique with an
Element it has a weakness to,
It will end up taking a lot of 
damage, Calu.
On the other hand, if a Digimon
is attacked
by a technique it has a resistance
to, it won't take much damage.

original:
A Digimon's Type is able to
help you understand
Which parameters are increased
easiest when it levels up.
Balance Type causes an average
increase in stats, Calu.
Attack Type causes a Digimon's
Attack to increase easier.
Defence Type causes a Digimon's
Defence to increase easier.
Speed Type causes a Digimon's
Speed to increase easier.
HP Type causes a Digimon's
HP to increase easier.
And MP Type causes a Digimon's
MP to increase easier, Calu.
translation:
A Digimon's Type is able to
help you understand
Which parameters are increased
easiest when it levels up.
Balance Type causes an average
increase in stats, Calu.
Attack Type causes a Digimon's
Attack to increase easier.
Defence Type causes a Digimon's
Defence to increase easier.
Speed Type causes a Digimon's
Speed to increase easier.
HP Type causes a Digimon's
HP to increase easier.
And MP Type causes a Digimon's
MP to increase easier, Calu.

original:
A Digimon's Skill refers to the
unique ability a Digimon possesses.
There are Skills such as destroying
huge rocks in the field,
Being able to dig holes, or being
able to dive into springs, Calu.
Bulldoze destroys large rocks,
Tree Cut cuts down large trees,
While Melt can help to melt
large blocks of ice, Calu!
Dig means your Digimon can dig
a hole into the earth,
And Dive allows you and your
Digmon to dive into springs, Calu!
translation:
A Digimon's Skill refers to the
unique ability a Digimon possesses.
There are Skills such as destroying
huge rocks in the field,
Being able to dig holes, or being
able to dive into springs, Calu.
Bulldoze destroys large rocks,
Tree Cut cuts down large trees,
While Melt can help to melt
large blocks of ice, Calu!
Dig means your Digimon can dig
a hole into the earth,
And Dive allows you and your
Digmon to dive into springs, Calu!

original: Tell me about Status Conditions
translation: Tell me about Status Conditions

original: Tell me about Status Changes
translation: Tell me about Status Changes

original: Tell me about Stat Changes
translation: Tell me about Stat Changes

original: Back
translation: Back

original: Tell me about Poison & Death
translation: Tell me about Poison & Death

original: Tell me about Paralysis, Confusion & Sleep
translation: Tell me about Paralysis, Confusion & Sleep

original: Tell me about how to cure Statuses
translation: Tell me about how to cure Statuses

original: Back
translation: Back

original: Tell me about Stat-lowering effects
translation: Tell me about Stat-lowering effects

original: Tell me about Stat-raising effects
translation: Tell me about Stat-raising effects

original: Back
translation: Back

original:
When a Digimon is Poisoned, with
each turn that passes,
10% of its Max HP will be drained,
Calu!
Plus, due to the side effects of the
terrible Virus,
The Digimon can't move either.
It's terrible, Calu!
As for Death, once a Digimon is
affected, it'll be knocked out!
No matter how much HP it has left,
it'll be taken down in a single hit!
That's why you've gotta be 
careful...
When battling a Digimon with
a Death effect technique, Calu!
translation:
When a Digimon is Poisoned, with
each turn that passes,
10% of its Max HP will be drained,
Calu!
Plus, due to the side effects of the
terrible Virus,
The Digimon can't move either.
It's terrible, Calu!
As for Death, once a Digimon is
affected, it'll be knocked out!
No matter how much HP it has left,
it'll be taken down in a single hit!
That's why you've gotta be 
careful...
When battling a Digimon with
a Death effect technique, Calu!

original:
When a Digimon gets Paralyzed,
they won't be able to move, Calu!
This results in a Digimon taking one
turn to rest, Calu!
As for when a Digimon is afflicted
with Confusion...
When its their turn, they'll randomly
attack on their own, Calu!
Moreover, they'll use their
weakest techniques, Calu.
It's such a waste of effort, Calu.

If a Digimon is afflicted with 
Sleep, they'll fall into a slumber!
They won't be able to do 
anything at all, Calu.
But as expected, when they're 
attacked, they'll wake up.
translation:
When a Digimon gets Paralyzed,
they won't be able to move, Calu!
This results in a Digimon taking one
turn to rest, Calu!
As for when a Digimon is afflicted
with Confusion...
When its their turn, they'll randomly
attack on their own, Calu!
Moreover, they'll use their
weakest techniques, Calu.
It's such a waste of effort, Calu.

If a Digimon is afflicted with 
Sleep, they'll fall into a slumber!
They won't be able to do 
anything at all, Calu.
But as expected, when they're 
attacked, they'll wake up.

original:
When it comes to Status Effects,
you can prevent those...
By equipping a Digimon with items
that resist that effect,
Or bring a Digimon with Traits that
prevent those effects, Calu!
And that's why what makes a 
skilled Tamer...
Is having the knowledge of these
Abilities, Equipment and Traits.
Status Effects do recover after
some time,
But in the meantime, you'll be in
a bit of a pinch, Calu!
So when you want to heal 
quickly,
You can use Confusion Heal or
Paralysis Heal items,
Or use Status Effect recovery
Techniques, Calu!
Also, this is a little secret, but if 
Digimon have high Friendship...
They'll have less chance of getting
a Status Effect, Calu!
It's the power of friendship, Calu!
translation:
When it comes to Status Effects,
you can prevent those...
By equipping a Digimon with items
that resist that effect,
Or bring a Digimon with Traits that
prevent those effects, Calu!
And that's why what makes a 
skilled Tamer...
Is having the knowledge of these
Abilities, Equipment and Traits.
Status Effects do recover after
some time,
But in the meantime, you'll be in
a bit of a pinch, Calu!
So when you want to heal 
quickly,
You can use Confusion Heal or
Paralysis Heal items,
Or use Status Effect recovery
Techniques, Calu!
Also, this is a little secret, but if 
Digimon have high Friendship...
They'll have less chance of getting
a Status Effect, Calu!
It's the power of friendship, Calu!

original:
One of the hidden abilities within
each of your Digimon's Techniques,
Is the ability to reduce parameters,
Calu!
If you're lucky, when you attack
an opponent...
It's effect will activate, and the
enemy's Parameters will decrease!
There are three different
Parameters that can be affected.
They are Attack, Defence,
and Speed, Calu!
One of these Parameters will
decrease for a short time,
And if you continuously inflict
that effect, 
The effect will continue to stack
each time, but...
Once it's worn off, the enemy's
Parameters will return to normal.
Make use of this and swing
the battle in your favor, Calu♪
translation:
One of the hidden abilities within
each of your Digimon's Techniques,
Is the ability to reduce parameters,
Calu!
If you're lucky, when you attack
an opponent...
It's effect will activate, and the
enemy's Parameters will decrease!
There are three different
Parameters that can be affected.
They are Attack, Defence,
and Speed, Calu!
One of these Parameters will
decrease for a short time,
And if you continuously inflict
that effect, 
The effect will continue to stack
each time, but...
Once it's worn off, the enemy's
Parameters will return to normal.
Make use of this and swing
the battle in your favor, Calu♪

original:
Some of the skills you can use on 
your allies have a parameter
boosting effect, Calu!

There are three different 
Parameters that can be affected:

Attack, Defense and Speed, Calu!

One of these Parameters will
increase for a short time.
The effect will continue to stack
each time, but...
Once it's worn off, your
Parameters will return to normal.
Make use of this and swing
the battle in your favor, Calu♪
translation:
Some of the skills you can use on 
your allies have a parameter
boosting effect, Calu!

There are three different 
Parameters that can be affected:

Attack, Defense and Speed, Calu!

One of these Parameters will
increase for a short time.
The effect will continue to stack
each time, but...
Once it's worn off, your
Parameters will return to normal.
Make use of this and swing
the battle in your favor, Calu♪

original:
Would you like to know about
Repairing?
translation:
Would you like to know about
Repairing?

original: What is Repairing?
translation: What is Repairing?

original: How does Repairing work?
translation: How does Repairing work?

original: Anything important to know?
translation: Anything important to know?

original: Back
translation: Back

original:
Repairing is used to clean up
dirty Bug Plates,
And turn them into DigiBlocks, or
'DigiPlates' for the Evolution Tree.
When you want to initiate 
Repairing, just enter the DigiLab,
And select the 'Repairing'
option.
Repairing uses the Tools from
the Tool Menu...
To clean up the Bug Plate.

But if you make a mistake and
damage the plate too much,
The plate will explode, so
be careful.
When you begin the Repairing
process...
The Bugs on the Plate will begin 
to move, blocking the data.
If the Bugs manage to block the
data completely,
You won't be able to continue,
so finish Repairing quickly, okay?
translation:
Repairing is used to clean up
dirty Bug Plates,
And turn them into DigiBlocks, or
'DigiPlates' for the Evolution Tree.
When you want to initiate 
Repairing, just enter the DigiLab,
And select the 'Repairing'
option.
Repairing uses the Tools from
the Tool Menu...
To clean up the Bug Plate.

But if you make a mistake and
damage the plate too much,
The plate will explode, so
be careful.
When you begin the Repairing
process...
The Bugs on the Plate will begin 
to move, blocking the data.
If the Bugs manage to block the
data completely,
You won't be able to continue,
so finish Repairing quickly, okay?

original:
When you want to change Tools
during the process,
Just touch the Tool icon on the
Tool Menu, okay?
When you succeed in Repairing,
you'll receive a score,
And for the Digimon of the
plate you've just finished repairing,
That score has a very important
meaning to it.
It will affect the number
of Techniques it can learn,
As well as change what is 
written in the Digimon Record.
Once you've successfully repaired 
that Digimon's plate once,
You can select the 'Auto Repair'
option, you know?
Lopmon will take over the 
repair process in your place.
It's much more casual, plus
your score will increase!♪
Also, if you redo a Repair, but
it doesn't go well,
Or the score you receive isn't
as good as your top score,
That DigiPlate will turn into
a 'Spare Plate'.
You can sell these Spare Plates
at any shop,
But it might be better to find
Octomon, instead.
After all, I heard that with
Octomon...
You can trade your Spare
Plates for some good items♪
translation:
When you want to change Tools
during the process,
Just touch the Tool icon on the
Tool Menu, okay?
When you succeed in Repairing,
you'll receive a score,
And for the Digimon of the
plate you've just finished repairing,
That score has a very important
meaning to it.
It will affect the number
of Techniques it can learn,
As well as change what is 
written in the Digimon Record.
Once you've successfully repaired 
that Digimon's plate once,
You can select the 'Auto Repair'
option, you know?
Lopmon will take over the 
repair process in your place.
It's much more casual, plus
your score will increase!♪
Also, if you redo a Repair, but
it doesn't go well,
Or the score you receive isn't
as good as your top score,
That DigiPlate will turn into
a 'Spare Plate'.
You can sell these Spare Plates
at any shop,
But it might be better to find
Octomon, instead.
After all, I heard that with
Octomon...
You can trade your Spare
Plates for some good items♪

original: What are Repairing Tools?
translation: What are Repairing Tools?

original:
What Tools can destroy
Crystal Bugs?
translation:
What Tools can destroy
Crystal Bugs?

original: What Tools can fix a DigiPlate?
translation: What Tools can fix a DigiPlate?

original: Back
translation: Back

original: Tell me about the Mega Laser
translation: Tell me about the Mega Laser

original: Tell me about the Giga Pick
translation: Tell me about the Giga Pick

original: Tell me about the Tera Hammer
translation: Tell me about the Tera Hammer

original: Back
translation: Back

original: Tell me about Putty
translation: Tell me about Putty

original: Tell me about the File
translation: Tell me about the File

original: Tell me about the Cleaner
translation: Tell me about the Cleaner

original: Back
translation: Back

original:
The Mega Laser is a tool that uses
heat to destroy whatever you touch.
When using it, just touch the spot
you want to destory.
It's best used to remove small
Crystal Bugs with precision,
Or to remove small but complex
parts.
translation:
The Mega Laser is a tool that uses
heat to destroy whatever you touch.
When using it, just touch the spot
you want to destory.
It's best used to remove small
Crystal Bugs with precision,
Or to remove small but complex
parts.

original:
The Giga Pick uses vibration to
destroy the spot you touch,
As well as damage the surrounding
area.
You can use it by holding your 
touch on a spot for a long time,
But its range is quite large, so be 
careful when using it, okay?
translation:
The Giga Pick uses vibration to
destroy the spot you touch,
As well as damage the surrounding
area.
You can use it by holding your 
touch on a spot for a long time,
But its range is quite large, so be 
careful when using it, okay?

original:
The Tera Hammer is a tool that
causes heavy damage,
Not only to wherever you touch,
but also a wide surrounding area.
It's especially useful when you
have large areas to destroy.
It destroys Bugs with a bang in
a single hit.
But if you use it too much, you'll
smash the Plate to pieces...
translation:
The Tera Hammer is a tool that
causes heavy damage,
Not only to wherever you touch,
but also a wide surrounding area.
It's especially useful when you
have large areas to destroy.
It destroys Bugs with a bang in
a single hit.
But if you use it too much, you'll
smash the Plate to pieces...

original:
Putty is used to fix any damage
on a DigiPlate.
Just touch the damaged area and
the Putty will be applied.
But remember what I'm about to
tell you, okay?
After using the Putty, you must 
use the File to clean it up.
Just don't use too much Putty, or
you'll be in trouble.
translation:
Putty is used to fix any damage
on a DigiPlate.
Just touch the damaged area and
the Putty will be applied.
But remember what I'm about to
tell you, okay?
After using the Putty, you must 
use the File to clean it up.
Just don't use too much Putty, or
you'll be in trouble.

original:
The File is used to remove the
Putty after you've used it.
You can polish the Putty cleanly if
you scrape it with the File.
But don't scrape along the 
DigiPlate, okay?
If you do, then the DigiPlate will
end up getting damaged again.
translation:
The File is used to remove the
Putty after you've used it.
You can polish the Putty cleanly if
you scrape it with the File.
But don't scrape along the 
DigiPlate, okay?
If you do, then the DigiPlate will
end up getting damaged again.

original:
The Cleaner is used to remove
the dirt from a DigiPlate.
Just touch the dirt and slide 
across it slowly...
And the dirt will be gone in an
instant!
Be sure to remove all the dirt,
make it sparkle!♪
translation:
The Cleaner is used to remove
the dirt from a DigiPlate.
Just touch the dirt and slide 
across it slowly...
And the dirt will be gone in an
instant!
Be sure to remove all the dirt,
make it sparkle!♪

original: I have no questions
translation: I have no questions

original: Tell me about setting DigiPlates
translation: Tell me about setting DigiPlates

original:
In the DigiLab, if you chose the
'DigiPlate' option,
You can then set a DigiPlate into
the Evolution Tree.
First, select what Plate you want 
to set from the available Plates.
Then select the correct
Evolution Tree for the Plate.
Then the DigiPlate you have
selected will be in the tray,
Just touch and slide the Plate
into the correct slot in the Tree.
If you choose the wrong slot,
you won't be able to set it.
The Digimon's silhouette is 
displayed on the slot as a hint♪
translation:
In the DigiLab, if you chose the
'DigiPlate' option,
You can then set a DigiPlate into
the Evolution Tree.
First, select what Plate you want 
to set from the available Plates.
Then select the correct
Evolution Tree for the Plate.
Then the DigiPlate you have
selected will be in the tray,
Just touch and slide the Plate
into the correct slot in the Tree.
If you choose the wrong slot,
you won't be able to set it.
The Digimon's silhouette is 
displayed on the slot as a hint♪

original:
Do you want to know about the
Tools Andromon sells?
translation:
Do you want to know about the
Tools Andromon sells?

original:
I want to know about the Tools
I've recently received.
translation:
I want to know about the Tools
I've recently received.

original: Tell me about the Giga Pick
translation: Tell me about the Giga Pick

original: Tell me about the Tera Hammer
translation: Tell me about the Tera Hammer

original: Back
translation: Back

original:
The Giga Pick uses vibration to
destroy the spot you touch,
As well as damage the surrounding
area.
You can use it by holding your 
touch on a spot for a long time,
But its range is quite large, so be 
careful when using it, okay?
translation:
The Giga Pick uses vibration to
destroy the spot you touch,
As well as damage the surrounding
area.
You can use it by holding your 
touch on a spot for a long time,
But its range is quite large, so be 
careful when using it, okay?

original:
The Tera Hammer is a tool that
causes heavy damage,
Not only to wherever you touch,
but also a wide surrounding area.
It's especially useful when you
have large areas to destroy.
It destroys Bugs with a bang in
a single hit.
But if you use it too much, you'll
smash the Plate to pieces...
translation:
The Tera Hammer is a tool that
causes heavy damage,
Not only to wherever you touch,
but also a wide surrounding area.
It's especially useful when you
have large areas to destroy.
It destroys Bugs with a bang in
a single hit.
But if you use it too much, you'll
smash the Plate to pieces...

original:
I want to know about higher-level
versions of my current Tools.
translation:
I want to know about higher-level
versions of my current Tools.

original: Tell me about Polymer Putty
translation: Tell me about Polymer Putty

original: Tell me about the Double Cleaner
translation: Tell me about the Double Cleaner

original: Back
translation: Back

original:
Polymer Putty is a higher quality
version of Putty.
It can easily fix a DigiPlate that's
covered in damage!
This Putty is much easier to 
remove than the regular Putty,
So there's no need to worry 
about accidently scraping the Plate!
translation:
Polymer Putty is a higher quality
version of Putty.
It can easily fix a DigiPlate that's
covered in damage!
This Putty is much easier to 
remove than the regular Putty,
So there's no need to worry 
about accidently scraping the Plate!

original:
The Double Cleaner is a much more
powerful Cleaner!
Its ability to clean up dirt is much,
much stronger!
Unlike the regular Cleaner,

It can remove even the most
stubborn dirty spots with ease!♪
translation:
The Double Cleaner is a much more
powerful Cleaner!
Its ability to clean up dirt is much,
much stronger!
Unlike the regular Cleaner,

It can remove even the most
stubborn dirty spots with ease!♪

original: I have no questions
translation: I have no questions

original:
I think Terriermon sent the SOS 
from around this area.
I heard he was kidnapped by the
Bandits in their own DigiShip...
But will Shuu really be okay on
his own...?
translation:
I think Terriermon sent the SOS 
from around this area.
I heard he was kidnapped by the
Bandits in their own DigiShip...
But will Shuu really be okay on
his own...?

original:
Somebodyyy! Please help meee!
I've been captureddd!
translation:
Somebodyyy! Please help meee!
I've been captureddd!

original: Shuu!!!
translation: Shuu!!!

original:
You really did come for me! 
Thanks! I knew you would!
translation:
You really did come for me! 
Thanks! I knew you would!

original:
This gate can't be opened from
the inside.
There should be a box with an
item inside somewhere nearby.
translation:
This gate can't be opened from
the inside.
There should be a box with an
item inside somewhere nearby.

original:
From there, find the Palette Key 
for the DigiPort!
translation:
From there, find the Palette Key 
for the DigiPort!

original:
If you insert the key you've got
there and press the gate switch,
The port gate should open!
translation:
If you insert the key you've got
there and press the gate switch,
The port gate should open!

original:
Then I'll let Patamon back at the
DigiPort know!
translation:
Then I'll let Patamon back at the
DigiPort know!

original: Hey... Patamon??
translation: Hey... Patamon??

original:
Oh, Shuu! 
You opened the gate!♪
The DigiPort System is linked to
the gates,
So this DigiPort should be usable
as well...!
translation:
Oh, Shuu! 
You opened the gate!♪
The DigiPort System is linked to
the gates,
So this DigiPort should be usable
as well...!

original:
I knew it, it's no use...

...Oh! Shuu!
translation:
I knew it, it's no use...

...Oh! Shuu!

original:
I told you, didn't I? That he'd 
definitely come for us!
translation:
I told you, didn't I? That he'd 
definitely come for us!
